Package acsse.csc03a3

Class Blockchain<T>

java.lang.Object
acsse.csc03a3.Blockchain<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of transaction the blockchain will store, allowing for generic transaction types.
public class Blockchain<T> extends Object
Represents a blockchain, a decentralized and distributed digital ledger implemented as a chain of blocks, each containing transactions. This class supports basic blockchain functionalities including adding blocks, registering stake for nodes, and validating the integrity of the chain.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Blockchain()
    Constructs a new Blockchain object initializing it with a genesis block.

  • Constructor Details

    • Blockchain

      public Blockchain()
      Constructs a new Blockchain object initializing it with a genesis block. Also initializes the stakes map to keep track of the stake associated with each node.

  • Method Details

    • addBlock

      public void addBlock(List<Transaction<T>> transactions)
      Adds a new block to the blockchain after transactions are given. This method automatically calculates the Proof of Stake (PoS) nonce for the new block before adding it.
      Parameters:
      transactions - The list of transactions to include in the new block.

    • registerStake

      public void registerStake(String nodeAddress, int stake)
      Registers a node's stake in the network. This is necessary for the Proof of Stake consensus mechanism.
      Parameters:
      nodeAddress - The address of the node.
      stake - The amount of stake (e.g., value units) the node holds.

    • isChainValid

      public boolean isChainValid()
      Validates the integrity of the blockchain by ensuring each block's hash and previous hash are correct.
      Returns:
      true if the blockchain is valid, false otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a string representation of the entire blockchain, listing all blocks and their content.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the blockchain.
